page.title: 18Children's clubs in Wenlock.
page.content: {Much Wenlock}has a{Guide, Scout, {Brownie}and{Cub}pack. They meet at the {Scout and Guide Hut}in{St. Mary's {Lane. There are{24 Brownies}with 15 on the waiting list. Their ages range from{7 to 10.}They meet on Tuesdays from 6:00p.m. to 7:30p.m. There are{27 cubs}with three leaders. They are aged between{8 and 11.}They meet every Wednesday from 6:30p.m. to 8:00p.m. There are between{10 and 15 Guides aged between{10 and 15.}They have a young leader of 18 years and two adult Guiders from outside Much Wenlock. They meet every Thursday at 7:00p.m. There are{26 Scouts}whose ages range from{11 to 15.}They meet every Friday from 7:30p.m. to 9:30p.m. Activities include{camping, working {for badges}and{helping the community.
